description.value:
This weapon or piece of ammunition is made of adamantine, one of the hardest substances in existence. Whenever this weapon or piece of ammunition hits an object, the hit is a Critical Hit.

Base items. This item variant can be applied to the following base items:

- Arrow (Adamantine Arrow)
- Battleaxe (Adamantine Battleaxe)
- Bolt (Adamantine Bolt)
- Club (Adamantine Club)
- Dagger (Adamantine Dagger)
- Energy Cell (Adamantine Energy Cell)
- Firearm Bullet (Adamantine Firearm Bullet)
- Flail (Adamantine Flail)
- Glaive (Adamantine Glaive)
- Greataxe (Adamantine Greataxe)
- Greatclub (Adamantine Greatclub)
- Greatsword (Adamantine Greatsword)
- Halberd (Adamantine Halberd)
